about_the_game:
《Master of refraction》is a puzzle mobile game developed by the team for running-in in the early stage. The game has good content（I think so), is free to play, and is used for promotion. There are in-app purchases in the game, but it has no connection with the content of the game, which absolutely does not affect any game experience! The content of in-app purchase crowdfunding includes the following four:

1. Support us and offer love (nothing will happen) (a total of 2.5 programs, really not enough manpower, fix the bug of "The Kingdom of God: Creation" , and "Heavenly Master" development);
2. Strong support and offer love (this in-app purchase includes the source code of the game);
3. Great support and offer love (this in-app purchase includes the game source code and UI pictures);
4. Super local tyrants support and offer love (This in-app purchase includes the above content, and a barrage release in the game).（Not immediately）


About Us:
Our team's games：
《神国：创造》/《The Kingdom of God》 is an independent game that integrates territorial management, resource management, strategic warfare, arms research, exploration, and more. As a special newborn god, the player has a kingdom of his own, forge ahead in the perilous void universe, develop and grow, and become the king of the new generation of gods.(On sale)
《天师》/《Heavenly Master》is an independent game based on Chinese cultivation culture and ghost legends, and is also the second game developed by our team. The player plays the role of one of the "chosen sons of heaven." In the ghostly resurrected city, the player polices evil and punishes the crime, and shoulders the important task of maintaining world peace.（Under development）
At the same time, we hereby promise that we will carefully read every one of your comments, no matter how good or bad. As long as it is reasonable and what everyone hopes, we will modify and improve the game. Thank you very much!

short_description: 《Master of refraction》is a puzzle game for children that combines "leisure" and "fun". Players can use props to adjust the angle of the turret and the mirror to light up the stars, so as to pass to the next level. This work was originally a mobile game.
